panels.description: Shows whether backend server is up.

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
  (
    sum without() (up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9090"})
      or
    (0 * sum_over_time(up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9090"}[7d]))
  )[7d:5m]
)

avg_over_time(
  (
    sum without() (up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9080"})
      or
    (0 * sum_over_time(up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9080"}[7d]))
  )[7d:5m]
)

avg_over_time(
  (
    sum without() (up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9070"})
      or
    (0 * sum_over_time(up{job="backend", instance="vm-dnsscan-db-1:9070"}[7d]))
  )[7d:5m]
)

panels.title: Backend
